column4: I can't access the internet on my ubuntu machine. I am connected to the network, thanks to brobostigon at #ubuntu-uk, but I still can't access the network because "The DNS lookup failed"
At a terminal try this, tell us if you get a response: "ping 109.74.197.122"
that command that thebiglightbulb gave you was incomplete. Press Ctrl+C to quit it.
